text:
People don't always live up to expectations, right? But with Kapil Sharma, expect the unexpected.
Hailed as the comedy king, Kapil Sharma was ruling the industry with his show when a fallout with his team on a flight led to his downfall. The tiffs among the team members even led him to slip into depression. He abused a lot of people, wasn’t keeping well when his friends and family members were worried for him. Later on, he had to go to a rehab and take a break from the world of glitz and glamour.
bizasialive.com
However, he made a comeback. After getting married to the love of his life Ginni Chatrath, he made waves once again after he returned with his hit show The Kapil Sharma show. While some old cast members including old Chandan Prabhakar, Kiku Sharda and Sumona Chakravarti returned along with him, and some new ones like Bharti Singh and Krushna Abhishek also joined him!
Twitter
What was the outcome you ask? He got a thunderous response from the audiences, who even said that they missed sitting with their families and enjoying a laughter riot on TV together.
What’s more? The Kapil Sharma Show is now the top show in the entire country. Beating Naagin 3, which ruled the TRP charts since the time it was launched.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Season 2 of The Kapil Sharma Show opened to a TRP of 3.4 and raked in 3.2 over the weekend. On the second spot is Super Dancer, which has garnered 3.1 TRP rating over the first weekend of 2019.
Interestingly, Naagin 3, which has been topping the TRP charts since the time it aired, has not even made to the Top 5.
Kapil Sharma isn’t hailed as the comedy king for anything. He is back with a bang! Congratulations, Kapil Sharma!
title: Back With A Bang! The Kapil Sharma Show Rules TRP Charts, Becomes The No.1 Show In The Country
description: The Kapil Sharma Show is now the top show in the entire country. Beating Naagin 3, which ruled the TRP charts since the time it was launched. Season 2 of The Kapil Sharma Show opened to a TRP of 3.4 and raked in 3.2 over the weekend. On second spot is Super Dancer, which has garnered 3.1 TRP rating over the first weekend of 2019.
